questions.title: 患者，男性，24岁，右下肺肺炎，查体：右下肺可闻及明显支气管呼吸音。患者病变多处于
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"痊愈期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"机化期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"充血期","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"实变期","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"消散期","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者，女性，27岁。游园时突然出现呼气性呼吸困难。查体：胸廓饱满，呼吸运动减弱，双肺叩诊呈过清音，两肺哮鸣音伴呼气延长，应首先考虑的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"支气管异物","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"支气管哮喘","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"支气管扩张","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"气胸","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"肺气肿","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者，女，57岁，长期咳嗽咳痰伴喘息。查体：桶状胸，语颤减弱，双肺过清音，肺下界下移且移动度变小，双肺可闻及湿罗音及哮鸣音。该患者首先考虑为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"支气管哮喘","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"慢性支气管炎并阻塞性肺气肿","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"支气管扩张","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"支气管肺炎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"肺不张","IsAnswer":false}]
